item.title: At Peace
item.description: [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/face_the_fire.md#ive-been-wasting-time-vyl-wnanory|You’ve got to find her. (You’ve got to find her.)]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/face_the_fire.md#ive-been-wasting-time-vyl-wnanory|Your mother ain’t fit to be alone.]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/face_the_fire.md#ive-been-wasting-time-vyl-wnanory|Her rosary beads are gone, there’s only one place she’d be.

item.title: Bastards
item.description: [[songs/b/billy_talent/afraid_of_heights/afraid_of_heights_reprise.md#now-im-waiting-on-the-corner-in-the-back-of-your-mind-vyl-wnanory|I hope this finds you well]] [[songs/b/billy_talent/afraid_of_heights/afraid_of_heights_reprise.md#now-im-waiting-on-the-corner-in-the-back-of-your-mind-vyl-wnanory|A father lost and mother dear]] [[songs/b/billy_talent/afraid_of_heights/afraid_of_heights_reprise.md#now-im-waiting-on-the-corner-in-the-back-of-your-mind-vyl-wnanory|The family that’s kept me here]] [[songs/b/billy_talent/afraid_of_heights/afraid_of_heights_reprise.md#now-im-waiting-on-the-corner-in-the-back-of-your-mind-vyl-wnanory|A hard lesson learned, and I’ve learned it well]] [[songs/b/billy_talent/afraid_of_heights/afraid_of_heights_reprise.

item.title: Bled Out
item.description: [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/we_are_not_alone/breakdown.md#let-the-fun-and-games-begin-vyl-wnanory|I feel the distance in your letters sent]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/we_are_not_alone/breakdown.md#let-the-fun-and-games-begin-vyl-wnanory|I left my family for the trenches]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/we_are_not_alone/breakdown.md#let-the-fun-and-games-begin-vyl-wnanory|You’ve got me worried about leaving]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/we_are_not_alone/breakdown.

item.title: Blessed Burden
item.description: [[songs/t/the_last_internationale/we_will_reign/life_liberty_and_the_pursuit_of_indian_blood.md#blood-vyl-wnanory|March. 1945 unwanted from his first breath.]] [[songs/t/the_last_internationale/we_will_reign/life_liberty_and_the_pursuit_of_indian_blood.md#blood-vyl-wnanory|A mother’s blessing born, a father’s burden worn.]] [[songs/t/the_last_internationale/we_will_reign/life_liberty_and_the_pursuit_of_indian_blood.md#blood-vyl-wnanory|The bright shine of the sunrise along the tile floor to the open door.

item.title: Blood in My Veins
item.description: [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/hear_me_now.md#can-you-hear-me-vyl-wnanory|Can you hear those birds sing?]] [[songs/c/caliban/i_am_nemesis/the_bogeyman.md#the-bogeyman-is-waiting-vyl-wnanory|Means we’re closer to shore]] [[songs/c/caliban/i_am_nemesis/the_bogeyman.md#the-bogeyman-is-waiting-vyl-wnanory|Means we’re closer to home]] [[songs/c/caliban/i_am_nemesis/the_bogeyman.md#the-bogeyman-is-waiting-vyl-wnanory|Further from love and war]] [[songs/c/caliban/i_am_nemesis/the_bogeyman.

item.title: Brothers
item.description: [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/deathbeds.md#i-watch-you-like-a-hawk-vyl-wnanory|You need to get out of this house.]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/deathbeds.md#i-watch-you-like-a-hawk-vyl-wnanory|I’ll walk you down to town.]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/deathbeds.md#i-watch-you-like-a-hawk-vyl-wnanory|We’ll go act our age, kick rocks, waste summer days.

item.title: But Breathing
item.description: [[songs/t/the_sisters_of_mercy/vision_thing/more.md#learning-to-cry-for-fun-and-profit-vyl-wnanory|Unwanted, but breathing.]] [[songs/t/the_sisters_of_mercy/vision_thing/more.md#learning-to-cry-for-fun-and-profit-vyl-wnanory|In the next room, sleeping.]] [[songs/t/the_sisters_of_mercy/vision_thing/more.md#learning-to-cry-for-fun-and-profit-vyl-wnanory|My mother, she’s crying and my father’s been drinking.]] [[songs/t/the_sisters_of_mercy/vision_thing/more.md#learning-to-cry-for-fun-and-profit-vyl-wnanory|In our run down apartment, where the roof is still leaking.

item.title: Carrying Weight
item.description: [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/die_another_day.md#slowly-escaping-vyl-wnanory|That soap box song stuck in his head.]] [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/die_another_day.md#slowly-escaping-vyl-wnanory|Burdens lie in graves past by.]] [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/die_another_day.md#slowly-escaping-vyl-wnanory|He carries his weight. that anthem for the disenchanted rings loud in waves of grain.

item.title: Cemetery Walls
item.description: [[songs/c/cold_cave/cherish_the_light_years/underworld_usa.md#oh-take-me-to-the-future-im-ready-vyl-wnanory|Climb those cemetery walls again;]] [[songs/c/cold_cave/cherish_the_light_years/underworld_usa.md#oh-take-me-to-the-future-im-ready-vyl-wnanory|Leave these flowers at your headstone.]] [[songs/c/cold_cave/cherish_the_light_years/underworld_usa.md#oh-take-me-to-the-future-im-ready-vyl-wnanory|Climb those cemetery walls again,]] [[songs/c/cold_cave/cherish_the_light_years/underworld_usa.md#oh-take-me-to-the-future-im-ready-vyl-wnanory|Every night; you can’t stand the sight of yourself.

item.title: Cowardice
item.description: [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.md#oil-remove-vyl-wnanory|“There’s no place for me.”]] [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.md#oil-remove-vyl-wnanory|A man of nowhere, a man of black heart from the dead end streets.]] [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.

item.title: Dead Set
item.description: [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/limousine.md#and-ive-one-more-night-vyl-wnanory|I’ve got this hope in my chest]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/limousine.md#and-ive-one-more-night-vyl-wnanory|I’ll see one more sunrise]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/limousine.md#and-ive-one-more-night-vyl-wnanory|I’ve got my brother’s good luck]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/limousine.md#and-ive-one-more-night-vyl-wnanory|Around my neck every night]] [[songs/a/a_perfect_circle/mer_de_noms/the_hollow.

item.title: Dear Father
item.description: [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/get_what_you_give/face_value.md#ive-been-so-lost-because-all-ive-found-is-hatred-and-corruption-vyl-wnanory|Bury him in the cold wet ground.]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/get_what_you_give/face_value.md#ive-been-so-lost-because-all-ive-found-is-hatred-and-corruption-vyl-wnanory|Familiar faces would have made him proud.]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/get_what_you_give/face_value.md#ive-been-so-lost-because-all-ive-found-is-hatred-and-corruption-vyl-wnanory|The military and the working man,]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/get_what_you_give/face_value.

item.title: Debts
item.description: [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.md#oil-remove-vyl-wnanory|It still looks the same here after all these years.]] [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.md#oil-remove-vyl-wnanory|The junkies and the steamboat men, the sun never set on them here.

item.title: Empty Glass
item.description: [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/vessel/ode_to_sleep.md#i-wake-up-fine-and-dandy-vyl-wnanory|The way she looked at you, tears streaming down her face.]] [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/vessel/ode_to_sleep.md#i-wake-up-fine-and-dandy-vyl-wnanory|You felt the brush of her dress as she walked away.

item.title: Nameless Streets

item.title: The City By Dawn

Chalk it up to a failure.]] [[songs/r/ra_the_rugged_man/all_my_heroes_are_dead/who_do_we_trust.md#theres-a-new-housing-plan-for-the-ghetto-eventually-vyl-wnanory|Push through the cold weather.]] [[songs/r/ra_the_rugged_man/all_my_heroes_are_dead/who_do_we_trust.md#theres-a-new-housing-plan-for-the-ghetto-eventually-vyl-wnanory|Racing heart, slow the beat, push through the defeat.

item.title: White Oak Doors
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/one_more_light/nobody_can_save_me.md#at-first-hallucination-vyl-wnanory|Lost in your own head, but then a knock at the door.]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/one_more_light/nobody_can_save_me.md#at-first-hallucination-vyl-wnanory|Put down that drink, your steps creaking the floor.
